com.bigdata.quorum

Interface QuorumEvent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractQuorum.E

    public interface QuorumEvent
    An interface for informational quorum events. These events are intended for clients interested in quorum state changes. Services that are HA aware use a more intimate API to handle the state changes.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    QuorumListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QuorumEventEnum getEventType()
      The type of event and never null.
      UUID getServiceId()
      The service identifier associated with the event, if any.
      long lastCommitTime()
      The lastCommitTime for which a vote was cast.
      long lastValidToken()
      The lastValid token at the time of the event.
      long token()
      The current quorum token at the time the event was generated.

    • Method Detail

      • getEventType

        QuorumEventEnum getEventType()
        The type of event and never null.

      • lastValidToken

        long lastValidToken()
        The lastValid token at the time of the event.

      • token

        long token()
        The current quorum token at the time the event was generated.

      • getServiceId

        UUID getServiceId()
        The service identifier associated with the event, if any. For example, when a service joins or leaves the quorum, this will be the UUID of that service.

      • lastCommitTime

        long lastCommitTime()
        The lastCommitTime for which a vote was cast.
        Returns:
        The lastCommitTime for which the vote was cast.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - unless getEventType() returns QuorumEventEnum.CAST_VOTE
